column1: Weighted MRI size (128, 256, 1) in T2, exhibiting the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section n°148 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. We observe the following characteristics: the brainstem of volume 14.5020 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5683.4473 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4705.2246 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 162.1582 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 514.1602 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1616.3086 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 230.7129 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 19.7754 mm³, the right putamen of volume 155.5664 mm³, the right globus pallidus of volume 160.8398 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 154.2480 mm³, the right amygdala of volume 125.2441 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 73.8281 mm³.
